full_summary:
## Request for Proposal
### Tender Name: SEAL, Plain

The Department of National Defence invites qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the provision of packing and gasket materials, specifically seals and gaskets.

#### Notice Details

| Field         | Value
| :------------ | :---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Reference No  | PW-22-01011069                                                                                  |
| Amendment No  | 2 |
| Solicitation No  | W8482-230968/A                                                                                |
| Publication Date  | 24 October 2022                                                                                |
| Tender Closing Date  | 9 December 2022 (14:00:00)                                                                       |
| Amendment Date  | 30 November 2022                                                                                |
| Procurement Category  | Goods and Services (GD)                                                                         |

#### Contract Requirements

We require a total quantity of 200 seals and gaskets to be delivered to two locations: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. The items required are as follows:

* Item 1: SEAL, Plain (GSIN: N5330, NSN: 21-2597465)
	+ Part number: 26246024231 (NCAGE: 73680, GARLOCK SEALING TECHNOLOGIES LLC)
	+ Part number: G292316 (NCAGE: 92798, THERMAL CERAMICS INC.)
	+ Quantity: 100
	+ Unit of issue: EA
	+ Delivery location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 2: SEAL, Plain (GSIN: N5330, NSN: 21-2597465)
	+ Part number: 26246024231 (NCAGE: 73680, GARLOCK SEALING TECHNOLOGIES LLC)
	+ Part number: G292316 (NCAGE: 92798, THERMAL CERAMICS INC.)
	+ Quantity: 100
	+ Unit of issue: EA
	+ Delivery location: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

#### Bidding Instructions

Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

#### Documents

The tender documents, including this notice and any subsequent amendments, may be downloaded from the Canada Buys website.

#### Contact

For more information, please contact:

* Cari-Ann Burnie
* Email: [cari-ann.burnie@forces.gc.ca](mailto:cari-ann.burnie@forces
